<style>
.case-study-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.5rem;
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

.case-study-card {
  border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
  border-radius: 8px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: box-shadow 0.2s, transform 0.2s;
  background: white;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.case-study-card:hover {
  box-shadow: 0 6px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
  transform: translateY(-3px);
}

.card-preview {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9fa 0%, #e9ecef 100%);
  padding: 2rem 1.5rem;
  text-align: center;
  border-bottom: 3px solid #0077b5;
}

.card-preview h3 {
  color: #0077b5;
  margin: 0 0 0.5rem 0;
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.card-preview .subtitle {
  color: #555;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  margin: 0;
}

.card-footer {
  padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
}

.tags {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.tag {
  background: #f0f0f0;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem;
  border-radius: 4px;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  color: #555;
}

/* Modal styles */
.slides-modal {
  display: none;
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.85);
  z-index: 9999;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}

.slides-modal.active {
  display: flex;
}

.slides-modal-content {
  width: 90%;
  height: 85%;
  max-width: 1200px;
  position: relative;
}

.slides-modal iframe {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
}

.slides-modal-close {
  position: absolute;
  top: -40px;
  right: 0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 2rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  background: none;
  border: none;
  padding: 0.5rem;
}

.slides-modal-close:hover {
  color: #ccc;
}
</style>

<!-- Modal for slides -->
<div class="slides-modal" id="slidesModal">
<div class="slides-modal-content">
<button class="slides-modal-close" onclick="closeSlides()">Ã—</button>
<iframe id="slidesFrame" src=""></iframe>
</div>
</div>

<script>
function openSlides(url) {
  document.getElementById('slidesFrame').src = url;
  document.getElementById('slidesModal').classList.add('active');
  document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
}

function closeSlides() {
  document.getElementById('slidesModal').classList.remove('active');
  document.getElementById('slidesFrame').src = '';
  document.body.style.overflow = '';
}

// Close on escape key
document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
  if (e.key === 'Escape') closeSlides();
});

// Close on click outside
document.getElementById('slidesModal').addEventListener('click', function(e) {
  if (e.target === this) closeSlides();
});
</script>
